reviewText: This video is an old classic with George Montgomery and Miguel Inclan as Geronimo redone in 1979 but was original in 1958. This Black & White is pretty accurate from Army Archives. Geronimo is urged to sign a treaty which guarantees that indian territory will be kept free from White mercenaries. 1885 Captain McCloud risks court-martial when he gets stuck in between and eventually convinces Geronimo to surrender.
